resources.string: WebbyManager is used within Activities to launch webservice requests asynchronously. First add a request to WebbyManager, then @Subscribe for WebbyEvents to handle the webservice response. Don\'t forget to check the WebbyEvent\'s resourceId to make sure it matches the one you asked for.

Webby works the same in a Fragment as it does in an Activity with only minor modification in where the WebbyManager gets instantiated. This view is being presented in a Fragment and the following Webby test is done entirely in this fragment.
